code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignInPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');try{const res=await fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await res.json();if(res.ok){localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(data));window.location.href='/';}else{setError(data.message||'Login failed');}}catch(err){setError('Network error');}setLoading(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{maxWidth:400,margin:'40px auto',padding:24,border:'1px solid #eee',borderRadius:8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:16},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:'100%',padding:8}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:16},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,style:{width:'100%',padding:8}})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:'red',marginBottom:16},children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,style:{width:'100%',padding:10,background:'#1976d2',color:'#fff',border:'none',borderRadius:4},children:loading?'Signing In...':'Sign In'})]})]});};export default SignInPage;
